mapper.insert:
select replace(uuid(), '-', '');
insert user(id, name, password, phone, email, gender, age, contact_address, real_name, id_card_no, last_login_ip, organization_id, status) values (#{id}, #{name}, #{password}, #{phone}, #{email}, #{gender}, #{age}, #{contactAddress}, #{realName}, #{idCardNo}, #{lastLoginIp}, #{organizationId}, #{status})
